title: AB 1175
content: The people of the State of California enact the following. Section 9873 of the Business and Professions Code is amended to set registration fees for electronic and appliance repair industry service dealers and service contractors in California. The initial registration fee for dealers is $205 per place of business, while for service contractors, it is $95 per place of business. The initial registration fees for electronic and appliance repair industry service dealers and service contractors in California are set as follows: $205 per place of business for dealers and $95 per place of business for service contractors. Additionally, the fee for individuals engaging in both industries is $405, and for those who are service contractors and engage in either industry, the fee is $300 per place of business. The registration fee for individuals engaging in both electronic and appliance repair industries in California is not more than $500 per place of business. Service dealers or contractors without a physical location in the state but operating in these industries must pay the same fee as if they had a place of business in California. The registration fee for individuals in the electronic and appliance repair industries in California is up to $500 per place of business. Service dealers or contractors without a physical location in the state must pay the same fee as if they had a place of business in California. The annual renewal fee for service dealers in California ranges from $400 to $475 per place of business, depending on the type of services provided. Dealers without a physical location in the state must still pay the registration fee as if they had a place of business in California. Service dealers or contractors in the electronic or appliance repair industry, or those selling service contracts in California, must pay the registration fee even if they do not have a physical location in the state. The delinquency fee is 50% of the renewal fee for a license. This section will be in effect until January 1, 2019, unless extended by a later statute. The director cannot increase any fees in this section before January 1, 2017. Section 9873 of the Business and Professions Code sets fees for electronic or appliance repair industry dealers or contractors in California. The director cannot increase fees before January 1, 2017, and this section will be repealed on January 1, 2019 unless extended by a later statute. Section 9873 of the Business and Professions Code in California sets fees for electronic or appliance repair industry dealers. The director regulates the fees, with the initial registration fee not exceeding $205 for each place of business. If a person operates as both types of dealers, the fee is capped at $405. The annual registration renewal fee for electronic or appliance repair industry service dealers in California is capped at $205 per place of business if renewed before expiration. For dealers operating in both industries, the fee is $400. A delinquency fee of 50% of the renewal fee applies. Effective January 1, 2019. The delinquency fee for license renewal is 50% of the renewal fee, effective January 1, 2019. The fees for various licenses under the Business and Professions Code are set by the chief and director, ranging from $120 to $940. The fees for various licenses under the Business and Professions Code range from $20 to $940. Individuals making pillows, quilts, etc. in their own homes are exempt from fees but must comply with all other provisions. Retail bedding dealer’s license fee exemptions: Individuals making pillows, quilts, etc. in their own homes are exempt from fees but must comply with all provisions. Retailers selling "used" and "antique" furniture are also exempt from fees and other provisions. Upholstered furniture and bedding sellers must comply with fee requirements. A person selling furniture for physical fitness must comply with fee requirements. Those licensed as upholstered furniture manufacturers or custom upholsterers do not need to pay an additional fee for a sanitizer's license.
